page.title: 10STEWARTBY: CHILDRENS VIEWS
page.content: Written by Lorraine Percival aged 14 I asked my dad a number of questions about what he thought of Stewartby, for he lives and works there. He said that he enjoyed living there because it is very quiet. He also found it handy to live in the village because of his work. It has a very good bus service to Bedford and the surrounding villages. His occupation is a burner; he works on top of a kiln and controls the burning of the bricks. He said it is quite an interesting job to do. There are some activities for the workers like bowling, golf, and squash. The local beauty spot is the quarry lake and many workers take their families here. A lot of sailing and speed boat racing goes on there, especially on Sundays. When it is not, people come to see the lake and bring their dogs
